timeline.bodyText: To be safe we could validate here that the type is equal to _doc. I think it may still be possible to pass through a custom type name using a transport CreateIndexRequest.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately we can't assume that type will be _doc, because we could be updating mappings on a 7x index that had a custom type name.  CreateIndexRequest asserts on the type name in its StreamInput constructor, so I think we should be safe there.
replies.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: Got it, I see the difficulty. I'm okay to merge as-is.
replies.author: jtibshirani
